sentences.en: Either view is permissible and logically consistent.
sentences.cn: 这两种观点都是允许的,逻辑上都是合理的.

sentences.en: For the standard arrow , the hotspot is , logically, the tip of the arrow.
sentences.cn: 对于标准箭头, 逻辑上热点是箭头尖部.

sentences.en: From that it followed logically that he would not be meeting Hildegarde.
sentences.cn: 由此，他不去见希尔德加德便是顺理成章的事了。

sentences.en: He can logically infer that if the battery is dead then the horn will not sound.
sentences.cn: 他可以符合逻辑地推测,如果蓄电池用完了,喇叭也就不会响了.

sentences.en: If you think other than logically.
sentences.cn: 你如果不合乎逻辑地推理.

sentences.en: It is not a logically compelling argument.
sentences.cn: 它在逻辑上并不是令人信服的理由.

sentences.en: Mike is my voice of reason. He thinks logically and points out where I'm going wrong.
sentences.cn: 迈克帮我保持理智。他的思维很有逻辑性，可以指出我的错误。

sentences.en: My professional training has taught me to look at things logically.
sentences.cn: 专业训练使我懂得看问题要讲求逻辑。

sentences.en: Some modes are logically equivalent but differ in their purpose.
sentences.cn: 有些模式逻辑上是等价的，但是用途却不同。

sentences.en: Some modes are logically equivalent but differ in their purpose. .
sentences.cn: 有些模式逻辑上是等价的，但是用途却不同。

sentences.en: Superstitions are often thought of as naive, popular beliefs that are logically or scientifically untenable.
sentences.cn: 迷信通常被认为是一些朴实天真, 流行甚广的信仰,从逻辑和科学的角度看都站不住脚.

sentences.en: The total amount can be deduced logically from the figures available.
sentences.cn: 总量可以从现有的数字中按照逻辑推断出来.

sentences.en: These remarks are logically out of place.
sentences.cn: 从逻辑上看这种论述是不恰当的.

sentences.en: They are in their essence logically anterior to God.
sentences.cn: 他们在逻辑上早于上帝的存在.

sentences.en: This position was logically sound, but not psychologically.
sentences.cn: 这一立场从逻辑上是正确的, 但从心理上讲则不然.

sentences.en: To write a good essay you must first organize your ideas logically.
sentences.cn: 要写出好文章,必须先从逻辑上理顺思绪.

sentences.en: Why is the function of staffing so seldom approached logically?
sentences.cn: 为什么任用功能如此难于作到合理?

words.tran_cn: 合逻辑的，合理的；逻辑学的
后勤学的；[数] 符号逻辑的
逻辑性；合论理性；论法的正确

trans.tran_cn: 逻辑上，符合逻辑地，能推理地
